name: FlatSoccer
description:
FlatSoccer is the classic online multiplayer football (Soccer in US) from discs, but with new features, a new way to dominate, to kick, and to choose your characteristics.

The Game has servers in South America, North America and Europe, with support for up to 20 people each.

Created by VGD, Project started 01 July 2021.

Discord: https://discord.com/invite/rg5fKWxCgF
